mapper.select: SELECT tc1.teach_comment_id,tc1.comment_type,tc1.comment_time,u1.user_name ,u1.avatar_store_name, tc1.user_id ,tc1.comment_times,tc1.like_times,tc1.share_times ,tc1.content FROM teach_comment as tc1, teach_inform,user_inform u1 where tc1.teach_id= #{teachID} and tc1.user_id=u1.user_id and tc1.teach_id=teach_inform.teach_id and comment_time BETWEEN #{sinceTime} and #{nowTime} ORDER BY tc1.comment_time DESC
